did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Delta Kappa Epsilon records, 1870-2003.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Delta Kappa Epsilon.Delta Chi Chapter (Cornell University).

did.physdesc: Minutes, lists, records, photographs, typescript history,pamphlets, directories, catalogs, brochures, memorabilia, and correspondence.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes, membership lists, initiation records, photographs, typescript narrative history, pamphlets, directories, catalogs, brochures, and memorabilia of Delta Kappa Epsilon.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes, membership lists, initiation records, photographs, typescript narrative history, pamphlets, directories, catalogs, brochures, and memorabilia of Delta Kappa Epsilon. Includes fund raising correspondence and other papers of Walter Bruske concerning Delta Kappa Epsilon at Cornell University; petition from H. William Fogle, Alumni Secretary to the New York State Dept. of Environmental Conservation to place two Norway spruce on the New York State Famous and Historic Trees Register, 1987; and petition from the Delta Chi Association to the National Register of Historic Places. Also, "The Delta Chi Deke" newsletter, 1935-1991; 1988 Pledge Class DKE history project research tasks binder; and report of the Alumni Historian, 1988. Also, an 1870 Cornellian listing Delta Upsilon as an "Anti-Secret Society." Includes an 1870 Charter, and a 1908 replacement charter. THE CORNELL DEKE HOUSE by William Fogle. Also a recording of the Muskrat Ramblers Dixieland Jazz Band performing at the DKE house at Spring Weekend in May 1967.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Chapter minutes since 1936 require written permission of President of Delta Chi Chapter, Delta Kappa Epsilon for access and reproduction. Boxes 3, 6, 13, 21, are restricted.

p.extref: Some files and additional information are available online in ecommons here: http://ecommons.library.cornell.edu/handle/1813/3223.
A copy of the detailed box list is available by clicking here. (5 MB Searchable PDF)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Delta Kappa Epsilon records, #37-4-1535. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Photographs

scopecontent.p: Includes photos of President Gerald Ford, George H. W. Bush, and George W. Bush, signed and inscribed to DKE. The G. W. Bush inscription congratulates DKE on their Lion Trophy.

Muskrat Ramblers Dixieland Jazz Band recording

scopecontent.p: Use DVD-863. Recorded at the DKE house during Spring Weekend. Performers may include: Walt Koken, (banjo), H. Philip Hodes (trombone, d. 2006), Leon Oakley (cornet), John C. Bittence (bass), Jack Hockenberry (trombone), Michel Sebastiani (clarinet), John F. Geherin (drums), Roy Rubinstein (trombone), Paul Somers (piano) and Michele Sebastiani (clarinet).

did.unittitle: Muskrat Ramblers Dixieland Jazz Band recording
